affirmation_List.affirmation: I am worthy of love and respect.
I am capable of achieving anything I set my mind to.
I choose to let go of negative thoughts and focus on the positive.
I trust my intuition and make wise decisions.
I am grateful for all the good things in my life.
I am surrounded by positive, supportive people who believe in me.
I am worthy of success and abundance.
I choose to focus on my strengths and use them to achieve my goals.
I forgive myself and others for past mistakes and move forward with love and compassion.
I am constantly growing and learning.
I am capable of handling any challenge that comes my way.
I am proud of myself and my accomplishments.
I am confident in my abilities and talents.
I am grateful for my body and all that it does for me.
I am surrounded by love and positive energy.
I am deserving of happiness and joy.
I am capable of making positive changes in my life.
I am surrounded by abundance and prosperity.
I trust the journey of my life.
I am grateful for the challenges in my life, as they help me grow and become stronger.
I am deserving of love and affection.
I choose to let go of anger and resentment, and replace it with love and understanding.
I am capable of achieving balance in all areas of my life.
I am surrounded by abundance and prosperity.
